actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agency Administration.
Subcommittee on Agency Administration. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to amend the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964 to increase from $15,000 to $25,000 the maximum amount that the heads of certain agencies may pay in settlement under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964 to increase from $15,000 to $25,000 the maximum amount that the Government may pay to settle a claim made by a member of the uniformed services or by an agency employee for loss of or damage to personal property incident to such individual's service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Personnel and Civilian Employees' Claims Act of 1964 to increase from $15,000 to $25,000 the maximum amount that the heads of certain agencies may pay in settlement under such Act.
